article_html:
HBO interviewer Max Kellerman's post-fight interview with Manny Pacquiao, following the Filipino's defeat against Floyd Mayweather. Pacquiao received some stern questioning by Kellerman after the bout, after he told the reporter he thought he'd won the fight.

HBO interviewer Max Kellerman's post-fight interview with Manny Pacquiao, following the Filipino's defeat against Floyd Mayweather. Pacquiao received some stern questioning by Kellerman after the bout, after he told the reporter he thought he'd won the fight. 'You thought you won the fight? Why?', Kellerman demands. Pacquiao looks a little flummoxed by the persistence of Kellerman's questioning and despite the language barrier does his best to explain
text: HBO interviewer Max Kellerman's post-fight interview with Manny Pacquiao, following the Filipino's defeat against Floyd Mayweather. Pacquiao received some stern questioning by Kellerman after the bout, after he told the reporter he thought he'd won the fight. 'You thought you won the fight? Why?', Kellerman demands. Pacquiao looks a little flummoxed by the persistence of Kellerman's questioning and despite the language barrier does his best to explain
title: Manny Pacquiao gets thoroughly patronised by HBO’s Max Kellerman - video
